name: unachat
description: UNAChat is a chat application based on Node.js and Socket.IO that simulates a Discord-style chat experience with multiple channels, active users, and a modern, easy-to-use interface. It also uses Auth0 to manage authentication, allowing users to log in and log out securely.
author: Acuña Mora David, Díaz Marín Javier, Ruíz Vásquez Dyllan
